text_block_list.text:
A short time had passed since Symboli Kris S 
had come to Tracen Academy. One day―

……Huu…… huuu…… Hu 
――――Haaaaa……!
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
It's just practice, but such intensity……! It's not just her 
acceleration, she's definitely got wonderful potential!
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
Symboli Kris S' running excited the crowd that 
had naturally gathered. She definitely has incredible 
intensity and abilities. But――

I couldn't help but be fascinated by her sharp, straight-forward 
gaze. I had an idea of what that gaze was focused on.
And my mission――I will complete it without fail.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: A gust of wind blows past.

She passed by the stands in the blink of an eye, her back 
receding in to the distance. What 『Mission』 was it that she 
sought to fulfill?――

Kris S-san! I can see your potential, it was 
a splendid run. Especially your strength on the 
straights! By all means, contract with――
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
Hey, talking to her first is no fair, senpai! Kris S-san, 
would you mind listening to what I have to say……?
text_block_list.name: Mid-Rank Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
……Maybe it was because she was staying silent, but the group of 
people around her seemed to grow larger and larger.

How does this sound? We decide on an order, 
and each of us acts as Kris S' trainer temporarily for a day?
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
I see. After she's worked with each of us, she 
can select the one she has the best compatability 
with……does that work for you, Kris S-san?
text_block_list.name: Mid-Rank Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
Suddenly, my eyes met with Symboli Kris S'. 
In those eyes, I could see she seemed troubled――

Without thinking, I stepped in front of my senpai. 
Shouldn't we listen to Symboli Kris S first?
No problem. ――I don't mind.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
……She's the one saying it, so I guess that's settled. 
So then, let's iron out a schedule first――
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
In the end, this ended up becoming a way to decide Symboli 
Kris S' trainer, essentially a 『Trainer Selection』 event.
choice_data_list: (I should learn as much as I can……!)

text_block_list.text:
There was Symboli Rudolf's request to 『Look after her』, 
and I could also learn from my senpai!

Judging by the data from yesterday's run, it seems like your 
aptitude is for medium distances on turf. In short, I think you 
can go for the Classic Triple Crown.
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
That's why, 2400m on turf―― let's try keeping the Derby in mind 
while you run. Along with that, try thinking about things like 
your approach and pace management!
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
Symboli Kris S calmly carried out the 
training menu……or so it seemed. However――

Huh……? On the final straight, 
I thought she'd push even harder……
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
The next day too, while training 
with the second trainer candidate――

With your physique and the power you showed 
in your run! Until your debut, I think focusing 
on strength training would be suitable.
text_block_list.name: Mid-Rank Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
So how about starting with slope training? 
With you, it should make a huge difference for your debut!
text_block_list.name: Mid-Rank Trainer A

text_block_list.text: ……Sorry, I cant―― do that yet.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
Eh, do you dislike slopes? Hmmmm, 
I thought it would go well though……
text_block_list.name: Mid-Rank Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
And so, the next day, and the day after that―― Symboli Kris S 
didn't seem to be so on board with this arrangement.

……And that's how it goes. 
She'll change the training menu on her own, you know?
text_block_list.name: Mid-Rank Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
When I ask her why, the only thing I get back 
is 『For my mission』…… it seems like she's quite 
the temperamental type, don't you think?
text_block_list.name: Mid-Rank Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
Same here…… I thought her acceleration power was wonderful but, 
she just can't seem to pull away. I'm not sure what to do……
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text:
I wonder if Symboli Kris S was okay―― I thought about it, 
and decided I should talk to her and find out.

It seemed like she wasn't willing to compromise at all. 
I asked her if the trainers' methods were the problem――
…… ……――Problem.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
About the trainers―― themselves, there's no…… problem. 
――They're thinking about me. ――Seriously.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
……There's something that―― I want to prioritize. 
――――My…… mission.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
――An Uma Musume like you, will revolutionize the racing 
world in Japan. One day, I believe that will happen.
text_block_list.name: Kris S' Mentor

text_block_list.text: ――Make the Japanese racing world, more exciting―― to do that.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
I could tell right away that she wasn't dodging the question. 
――Her eyes, were just too straightforward.
